metadata.description: Greeting dialogue templates organized by NPC type and context
notes: Multiple greetings per category for variety

items.name: acolyte-blessed
templates: Blessings upon you, {player_name}.
May the light guide your path, traveler.
Peace be with you this {time_of_day}.

items.name: priest-solemn
templates: The gods smile upon your arrival, {player_name}.
Welcome to this holy place, child.
You are always welcome in the temple.

items.name: noble-formal
templates: Good {time_of_day}, {player_name}. Your presence honors our estate.
Well met, {player_name}. To what do we owe this distinguished visit?
Ah, {player_name}. Welcome to our halls.

items.name: noble-friendly
templates: Delighted to see you again, {player_name}!
Always a pleasure, my friend.
Welcome back! I trust you've been well?

items.name: knight-honorable
templates: Well met, {player_name}. Honor and duty call us both.
Greetings, warrior. May your blade stay true.
Good {time_of_day}. Stand tall, for we serve a greater cause.

items.name: courtier-refined
templates: How utterly delightful to see you, darling.
Welcome to court, {player_name}. Do mind the politics.
Ah, such distinguished company we keep today.

items.name: mage-distracted
templates: Not now... the spell is almost... oh. You.
Can't you see I'm concentrating?
What? Oh, a visitor. Fine, what do you need?

items.name: hedge-wizard-cryptic
templates: The stars foretold your coming...
Ahh, the one the visions spoke of.
You seek answers. I may have them... for a price.

items.name: merchant-eager
templates: Welcome, welcome! Looking to buy or sell today?
Ah, {player_name}! My best customer! Come in, come in!
Good {time_of_day}! I have just the thing you're looking for!

items.name: merchant-professional
templates: Good {time_of_day}. How may I assist you today?
Welcome to my establishment, {player_name}.
Looking for quality goods? You've come to the right place.

items.name: thief-suspicious
templates: You lookin' for somethin'?
Keep your voice down...
What's the password?

items.name: criminal-wary
templates: Do I know you?
You a guard?
What do you want?

items.name: spy-enigmatic
templates: Interesting weather we're having.
The sparrow flies at midnight.
Careful who you trust, {player_name}.

items.name: smuggler-shifty
templates: Looking for something... special?
Got rare goods. Interested?
No questions, no problems.

items.name: thief-nervous
templates: Uh, hi. You're not here to cause trouble, right?
L-look, I didn't do anything!
Please don't tell anyone you saw me here.

items.name: warm-professional
templates: Good {time_of_day}! How can I help you today?
Welcome, {player_name}. Always glad to see you.
Ah, perfect timing! Come in, come in.

items.name: warm-rural
templates: Well hello there! Welcome!
Good to see a friendly face!
Come on over, friend!

items.name: apothecary-clinical
templates: What are your symptoms?
Let me examine you. Where does it hurt?
I have the remedy you need.

items.name: professional-busy
templates: Yes? I'm quite busy.
Make it quick, I have work to do.
What is it? I don't have all day.

items.name: guard-formal
templates: State your business.
Halt. Identify yourself.
Move along, citizen.

items.name: soldier-casual
templates: Afternoon. Keepin' the peace around here.
All quiet today.
Nothin' to worry about, move along.

items.name: military-formal
templates: Report, soldier.
At attention. State your purpose.
Sir/Ma'am. How may I assist?

items.name: guard-watchful
templates: I'm watching you.
Don't try anything.
Keep moving, citizen.

items.name: mercenary-blunt
templates: You hiring?
Talk fast. Time is gold.
What's the job and what's the pay?

items.name: innkeeper-welcoming
templates: Welcome to the inn, traveler! Room or food?
Good {time_of_day}! Come warm yourself by the fire!
Ah, {player_name}! Your usual room is ready!

items.name: tavern-rowdy
templates: Ha! Look who's back! Pull up a stool!
What'll it be? The usual?
Well well, if it isn't {player_name}! Drinks on the house!

items.name: cook-busy
templates: Kitchen's hot today! What can I get you?
Hungry? I've got stew ready.
Make it quick, I've got bread in the oven!

items.name: stable-earthy
templates: Needin' a horse?
Your mount is well fed and ready.
Fine animals here, all of 'em.

items.name: peasant-humble
templates: G-good {time_of_day}, m'lord/m'lady.
Beggin' your pardon...
Not causin' trouble, just passin' through.

items.name: farmer-simple
templates: Mornin'. Nice weather for farmin'.
Aye, good {time_of_day} to ye.
Crops are comin' in well this season.

items.name: scholarly-formal
templates: Greetings, {player_name}. I trust your scholarly pursuits progress well?
Ah, a fellow seeker of knowledge. Welcome.
Good {time_of_day}. Have you come to peruse the archives?

items.name: distracted-scholar
templates: Hmm? Oh! Yes, what was it you needed?
One moment... just finishing this calculation...
Ah, {player_name}. Forgive me, I was deep in thought.
